title: Figure out what to do with en_core_web_sm dependency
body:
Dependency links are deprecated in pip and replacement, PEP https://stackoverflow.com/a/53412651/2996250 seems to be disabled when installing a package from Pypi for security reasons.

To clarify the current state, it's already broken with a recent pip version and the latest version on Pypi. It will crash with:

```
$ pip install bugbug
Collecting bugbug
  Downloading https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/01/26/bdb3d20d76760ed7f435b04b814b3e0f24f10b9d0f8acf566f72dfb032aa/bugbug-0.0.14-py3-none-any.whl (81kB)
     |████████████████████████████████| 81kB 5.5MB/s 
Collecting shap==0.28.5 (from bugbug)
...
Collecting en-core-web-sm (from bugbug)
  ERROR: Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement en-core-web-sm (from bugbug) (from versions: none)
ERROR: No matching distribution found for en-core-web-sm (from bugbug)

```
